spriteManager::spriteSet

Detailed Description

A set of raw data that spriteObjects may use to easily load themselves.

Contains both pallete and GFX data. Note that a spriteSet must have its pallete loaded into memory before it can be useful, this is done via spriteManager::spriteSetLoadPallete()
